name: Awkward Greeting
description: Your date says hello and you reply "Good, how are you?"

name: Emergency Exit
description: Your date talks nonstop about their ex. You frantically search for an exit and realize you’re trapped.

name: Friend Zoned
description: You have fallen into the bottomless pit of despair. The dreaded friend zone.

name: I Love You
description: Your first date is going great. You try to say "I love hot sauce." Instead you say "I love you."

name: Waiting for a Reply
effect: During scoring each round, you may add 1 point to your score for each Emotional Disaster card in your Disaster area.
description: You've been left on read for 66 million years.

name: Caught in the Rain
effect: During scoring each round, you may add 1 point to your score for each Natural Disaster card in your Disaster area.
description: Your look was on point until it started raining acid.

name: Drifting Apart
description: Your date said even an ice age couldn't keep you apart. They lied.

name: Table Manners
description: Your date chews loudly with their mouth open. You get caught in the crossfire.

name: Wave Goodbye
description: It's the first date you've had in years. A tsunami strikes. You lose your date to the sea.

name: You're on Fire
description: You’re at the bar chatting up dinos, and you’re on fire. Oh, wait. You’re literally on fire.

name: Catfished
effect: During scoring each round, you may add 1 point to your score for each Predatory Disaster card in your Disaster area.
description: Your profile picture looked nothing like this!

name: Coolest Dino Ever
description: You run into a dino who is so cool, you totally understand when they leave with your date.

name: Pterrible Move
description: You accidentally liked your ex's photo. Your phone dies before you can unlike it.

name: Picnic Pests
description: You plan a romantic picnic. Tiny dinos steal your food. And your date.

name: Snack Attack
description: Your date said you're so cute they could eat you. You're starting to think they were serious.
